text: int max ( int , int ) ; int main ( ) { int * * a , l , n , i , j , k ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < n ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & l ) ; a = ( int * * ) malloc ( l * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < l ; i ++ ) a [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( ( i + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < l ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = l - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] += max ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] , a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; } int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; else return b ; }
